dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint - Siam Global Associates
dmca.body:
SIAM GLOBAL ASSOCIATES Co., Ltd.
Suite 606, Nai Lert Building
87 Sukhumvit, Klongtoey
Vadhana, Bangkok 10110
Tel: (662) 650 3510 (-12)
Fax (662) 655 0655
email: sgalegal@cscoms.com
www.sgalegal.com

20 February 2007
Total Pages: 17
By: Fax and Registered Mail

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support
600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

CC: Tawee Ponsila
Royal Thai Police Officer
Economic Crime Investigation Division
Central Investigation Bureau
North Sathorn Road, Bangrak District
Bangkok Thailand 10500

Re: Report of Infringement

Dear Google Legal Support:

We are writing to inform you of an infringement of our website: www.thailandlawyer.com. We request that you take appropriate action to prevent further publication of the infringing webpage since such publication is illegal under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Thailand law and International Treaties.

We have followed the procedure that you have set out on your website. The part of our website that has been infringed upon is the "Thailand Marriage Law to Marry in Thailand..." page that appears at www.thailand-lawyer.com/marriage.html.

In accordance with the categories you have set out on your website, we inform as follows:

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text on the webpage "Thailand Marriage Law to Many in Thailand..." that appears at www.thailand-lawyer.com/marriage.html (Exhibit 1).

2. The infringing material appears on the webpage www.thailand-business-services.com/faq.php (Exhibit 2). The text, which provides information about marriage registration in Thailand, appears almost verbatim on the offending website. The web plagiarism search, Copyscape, found 733 matching words between the 741 words of text on www.thailand-business-services.com/faq.php and www.thailandlawyer.com/marriage.html. The number of matching words is actually 740 as Copyscape did not read words with apostrophes or quotation marks. Please see the
results of the copyscape analysis of the offending website in Exhibit 3; the matching words appear in bold.

The webpage www.thailand-business-services.com/faq.php can be accessed using the following search query:

Search Query: marriage Thailand lawyer
Infringing webpage: www.thailand-business-services.com/faq.php

3. E-mail address of Siam Global Associates, the owner of the website that has been infringed upon: sgalegal@cscoms.com. (See Exhibit 4 for the Network Solutions domain name registry for thailand-lawyer.com)

4. E-mail address of Thailand Business Services, the owner of the website with the infringing material: thompsonservices@yahoo.com (See Exhibit 5 for the Network Solutions domain name registry information for thailand-business-services.com)

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best Regards,

J. Leeds
Managing Director and Attorney-at-law
Siam Global Associates Co., Ltd.
